author: jwasinger
content:
hey <@755913785620824175> how are you filling those 4844 tests?  I am trying to add tests for eip-6780 configured w/ cancun and cannot get them to fill (or even detect the fillers): https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/122

I have configured my setup to fill using Geth at the current master branch revision (maybe that's my problem here).

author: marioevz
content: Hey, since cancun is still an upcoming fork, flag `--latest-fork Cancun` is needed to force the filler to look for cancun tests

author: marioevz
content: This should also unlock the `ShanghaiToCancunAtTime15k` fork

author: jwasinger
content: do you have this working with geth as the backing client?

author: marioevz
content: yes but only for the github.com/mdehoog/go-ethereum@eip-4844 branch, that one has all the t8n changes for cancun already

author: marioevz
content:
Sorry the flag is: `--latest-fork Cancun`
with capital C

author: techbro_ccoli
content: Yeah exactly this! I will add it to the release notes - sorry for any confusion
